about_the_game:
You are Father David Wallace, a priest and former linguistics researcher from Scotland. Having been called to Birch Manor outside of Glasgow to perform an exorcism, you find that there’s a lot more going on in Birch Manor than a single possession. You must find out the true reason you were called here and put an end to the Azurael rituals once and for all.

The fifth and final act in the series of horror stories following the events surrounding Azurael. This chapter brings the plot to its conclusion while challenging both your nerve and puzzle solving skills.

Features
  • Investigate Birch Manor and discover Mr Birch's final plan.
  • Solve many different puzzles to progress.
  • Two endings to discover.
  • Discover many other secrets.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of mild fantasy horror.

You are Father David Wallace, a priest and former linguistics researcher from Scotland. Having been called to Birch Manor outside of Glasgow to perform an exorcism, you find that there’s a lot more going on in Birch Manor than a single possession. You must find out the true reason you were called here and put an end to the Azurael rituals once and for all.

The fifth and final act in the series of horror stories following the events surrounding Azurael. This chapter brings the plot to its conclusion while challenging both your nerve and puzzle solving skills.

name: Azurael’s Circle: Chapter 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB VRAM, 3D accelerator compatible w/ DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Azurael's Circle is a horror-mystery adventure game. Navigate the manor and piece together the real reason why you're here. Combine items in your inventory to get into locked areas of the house and find other useful tools that can help you uncover the truth while meeting a few familiar faces.
